Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.factory

Class WeaponFactory

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.factory.WeaponFactory
@Component public class WeaponFactory extends Object
A factory service for a creating Weapon objects based on their WeaponType.

  • Method Details

    • createWeapon

      public Weapon createWeapon(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode weapon) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Creates a Weapon object based on the provided JSON node. Depending on the weaponType field, the method returns a RangedWeapon or MeleeWeapon.
      Parameters:
      weapon - The JSON node containing the weapon data.
      Returns:
      A Weapon object, which could be either a RangedWeapon or MeleeWeapon, or null if the weapon type is not recognized.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there is an error processing the JSON input.
